enhanced_description: Cognitive Talent Partners LLP is a nimble, agile, and disruptive global cross-border retained executive search firm with offices in New York, India, and Belgium. Valued as a trusted and preferred partner, they serve some of the world's largest Global Private Equity Funds, Asian Business Groups, Global Indian Business Corporates, and MNCs across various sectors. They specialize in partnering with Global Private Equity funds invested in Technology, Financial Services, Retail, Consumer, Engineering, Infrastructure, and Shared Services portfolio companies to deliver winning teams. With deep expertise in engaging diverse stakeholders including Promoters, Boards, Investors, CEOs, and Management Teams, they aim to deliver differentiated value. A key focus is on identifying global talent pools in Digital, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Product Management, Social, Mobile, and Robotics, alongside offering a global diversity talent identification service.
